title: Awful download speed (mac client)
body:
I'm frequently updating games with 7-8mbps download speeds, so why is it that league is stuck at around 700kbps? There used to be settings to set maximum download speeds etc, but I can't find that anymore.

Run Hextech repair tool showed no issues. Disabling Avast (which nothing else ever requires me to do, by the way), didn't help.

At this point, it would literally be faster for me to download the whole thing as a .dmg or .zip from your-average-low-bandwidth-budget site via the browser than via the dedicated client. What gives? Is there any way to fix this or change the download limit?

replies.body: Are you running on wifi at all?  It sounds like your network might be unstable, so it's backtracking and failing to grab every update.  I recommend using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this.  If the issue persists, though, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help assist you directly.
